title: Our Daily Bread Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Deli and gluten-free bakery. Offers vegetarian food (veggie burgers, wraps, sandwiches, home fries) and fish (salmon, tuna salad, lox). One daily vegan lunch special, usually a salad, two daily soups. Uses eggs and dairy.
